exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.notes: Focus on depth and strict form. Use a weight you can control.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Maintain control. Slight arch in back, shoulder blades retracted.

exercises.name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
exercises.notes: Pull towards the lower ribcage. Keep core tight.

exercises.name: Barbell Bicep Curl
exercises.notes: Avoid swinging the body. Full range of motion.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.notes: Keep hips aligned with shoulders and feet.

days.focus: Full Body B: Posterior Chain and Volume

exercises.name: Deadlift (Conventional or Trap Bar)
exercises.notes: Prioritize flawless form over weight. Start light.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Focus on the stretch at the bottom.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.notes: Pull the bar to your upper chest, squeezing the lats.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Walking Lunges
exercises.notes: Focus on balance and pushing off the front foot.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown (Cable)
exercises.notes: Keep elbows tucked to your sides.

exercises.name: Face Pulls (Cable)
exercises.notes: A critical exercise for shoulder health and posture.

days.focus: Full Body C: Compound Variation & Accessory Work

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: Do not lock out your knees at the top.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.notes: Pull with your back muscles, not just your arms.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Keep legs relatively straight. Focus on stretching the hamstrings.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Lowers weight slowly behind the head for a deep stretch.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curls
exercises.notes: Palms facing inwards (neutral grip). Good for forearm development.
